it.apice.sapere.api.space
Interface LSAspace

All Known Subinterfaces:
ExtLSAspace
public interface LSAspace

This interface models an LSA-space (local) as seen by a SAPEREAgent, so capable of storing and retrieve LSAs whenever needed.

This entity is intended to be:

  • Atomic
  • Passive
  • Mutable
  • Thread-safe

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary
 LSAspace ignore(LSAid lsaId, SAPEREAgent requestor, LSAObserver obs)
           Stop observing the specified LSA.
 LSAspace inject(LSA lsa)
           Inserts in the space a new LSA.
 LSAspace observe(LSAid lsaId, SAPEREAgent requestor, LSAObserver obs)
           Starts observing the specified LSA.
 LSA read(LSAid lsaId)
           Retrieves the requested LSA.
 LSAspace remove(LSA lsa, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Removes the LSA from the space.
 LSAspace update(LSA lsa, SAPEREAgent requestor)
           Updates the LSA in the space, which has the same LSA-id, with values from the provided one.
 

Method Detail

inject

LSAspace inject(LSA lsa)
                throws SAPEREException

Inserts in the space a new LSA.

Parameters:
lsa - The LSA to be inserted
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - An LSA with the same LSA-id has already been inserted

read

LSA read(LSAid lsaId)
         throws SAPEREException

Retrieves the requested LSA.

Parameters:
lsaId - The LSA-id of the requested LSA
Returns:
The LSA the caller requested
Throws:
SAPEREException - The requested LSA does not exists in this LSA-space

remove

LSAspace remove(LSA lsa,
                SAPEREAgent requestor)
                throws SAPEREException

Removes the LSA from the space.

Parameters:
lsa - The LSA to be removed
requestor - The Agent which perpetrates the action
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - The requester is not allowed to remove the LSA (e.g. it does not owns it) or the LSA is not in the LSA-space

update

LSAspace update(LSA lsa,
                SAPEREAgent requestor)
                throws SAPEREException

Updates the LSA in the space, which has the same LSA-id, with values from the provided one.

LSAId lsaId = getLSAId();
LSA lsa = read(lsaId);

LSA modLsa = modifyLSA(lsa);
assert modLsa.getLSAId().equals(lsaId);
s
update(modLsa);
assert modLsa.equals(read(lsaId));

Parameters:
lsa - The LSA to be removed
requestor - The Agent which perpetrates the action
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - The requester is not allowed to update the LSA (e.g. it does not owns it) or the LSA is not in the LSA-space

observe

LSAspace observe(LSAid lsaId,
                 SAPEREAgent requestor,
                 LSAObserver obs)
                 throws SAPEREException

Starts observing the specified LSA.

Parameters:
lsaId - The LSA-id of the LSA to be observed
obs - The entity that will observe the LSA (an Agent)
requestor - The Agent which perpetrates the action
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
Throws:
SAPEREException - The requester is not allowed to observe the desired LSA (not bound or not not local)

ignore

LSAspace ignore(LSAid lsaId,
                SAPEREAgent requestor,
                LSAObserver obs)

Stop observing the specified LSA.

If obs isn't actually observing the LSA then the request is dropped silently.

Parameters:
lsaId - The id of the LSA to ignore
requestor - The Agent which perpetrates the action
obs - The entity that is observing the LSA (an Agent)
Returns:
The LSAspace itself for further operations
